context.title: Create Google Cloud Dataflow Project
context.description: This wizard creates a new Eclipse project for Google Cloud Dataflow. &group-id; &artifact-id; Project template: The initial contents of the generated project. Starter pipeline contains a simple pipeline which logs its input. Example pipelines contains the Dataflow Word Count examples. Dataflow version: 2.5.0 is based on Apache Beam and includes the org.apache.beam packages. Package: The Java package in which the sample code is placed. Name template: How the Eclipse project name is calculated from the Maven coordinates.
